questions: Name the country which follows ‘coming together’ style of federalism.
Which subjects are included in the Union List ?
answers: Defence of the nation, foreign affairs, banking, currency, communication.

questions: Which type of government has two or more levels ?
Which subjects falls under the concurrent list ?
answers: Marriage, education, forest, trade unions, adoption and succession.

questions: The subject of Computer Software comes under which list ?
In case of any dispute about the division of powers who can make a decision ?
answers: The High Court and the Supreme Court can make a decision.

questions: Which subjects are included in the state list ?
Which groups of countries are an example of holding together federation ?
The federal system serves which two dual objectives ?
answers: First, to safeguard and promote unity of the country and secondly, to accomodate regional diversity. 1
